overview: Dirk Yates and Chi Chi LaRue bring back legendary Axel Garret after a seven year absence in this authentic and steamy period epic of the Wild West! How the West Was Hung features everything from a four horse drawn stagecoach to a bar room brawl! Dirk pulls out all the stops on one of the year's biggest productions. Joining Axel are some of the biggest and hottest stars in this multi-award winning extravaganza.
title: How the West Was Hung
